text: How do we define the term 'millennial'? Also known as Generation Y – are people born between the mid-1980s and early 2000s. It's a common term in the news – often because people born in this time in the West are seen to have certain characteristics.

text: They're sometimes described as lazy and obsessed with themselves – and while that's not necessarily true, Caroline Beaton says millennials are highly self-critical.

text: And one more possible reason why the self-help industry does well: it's very resistant to recessions. When the economy does badly – as we say it goes into recession – people are perhaps even more likely to reach for self-help to improve their situation.
